about_the_game:
Survive or Succumb: Extant – A Zombie Eradication Co-op Simulation

The Pinnacle of Survival Gaming: Where Solo Valor Meets Unbreakable Team Bonds in a Zombie-Infested Wasteland

Dive headfirst into the apocalypse with Extant: Zombie Eradication Co-op Simulation, a groundbreaking multiplayer co-op that merges first-person and third-person shooter dynamics into a military extraction narrative teeming with undead threats. This game transcends mere survival, challenging you to not only endure but to excel, ensuring the survival of underground communities by securing essential supplies.

The World's Descent into Darkness:

Humanity teeters on the brink of extinction, with the last remnants taking refuge in fortified bunkers, secluded tunnels, and hidden forest sanctuaries. As vital supplies dwindle, the call to action rings out to Extant Special Operator Groups—squads of four supremely trained operators tasked with infiltrating the most dangerous zones on Earth to retrieve the resources that are crucial for human survival. You are one of these elite operatives, and your mission is clear.

Solo Prowess United with Strategic Alliances:

In Extant, your survival is as much about your individual sharpshooting skills and FPS mastery as it is about orchestrating strategies with your team. Despite being deployed in separate locations to minimize undead attention, seamless voice chat ensures you're never truly alone, allowing for real-time strategic planning and execution without breaking immersion.

Against the Clock:

Every mission is a race against time. You have only 30 minutes to navigate through the desolation, collecting food, medicine, and survival gear. Stealth and speed are your allies; hesitation or noise is your doom. Initially, the undead may seem manageable, but be warned: their numbers are deceiving, and they will gather in overwhelming swarms.

Strategic Choices & Communication Are Key:

Collaboration is possible and encouraged, but fraught with danger. Every decision must be weighed, every movement planned. Share intel with your team on zombie movements and potential threats. Resources can be deposited at designated exfiltration points, allowing for greater loot collection. However, when the extraction chopper arrives, you have a mere 30 seconds to make your escape—miss it, and you're left to the mercy of the undead.

Diverse Battlegrounds Await:

Your valor will be tested in four unique environments, each presenting its own set of challenges and requiring a tailored approach to conquer. From the silent, snow-covered forests to the ruins of urban decay, adaptability and teamwork are your greatest assets.

You Are Humanity's Last Beacon:

The stakes have never been higher. Each mission is a delicate balance between triumph and catastrophe. It's time to demonstrate your unparalleled skills, eradicate the undead menace, and carve out a future for humanity.

Ready for the Ultimate Challenge?

Embark on a journey where every bullet counts, every strategy could mean survival or doom, and the fate of humanity rests in the balance. Extant: Zombie Eradication Co-op Simulation isn't just a game; it's a call to arms. Will you answer?

content_descriptors.notes: This is a zombie game so it will have the violence and gore that is typically associated with the genre.

short_description: The apocalypse was years ago. Those still living are termed the 'Extant'. The dead can smell the living from a mile away. Because of this, Extant SOG groups of four operators have been tasked with infiltrating areas with supplies alone to retrieve for the Extant civilians. You are one of them.
